title: Amnesty LGBTI Meeting
description:
Join us for coffee and letter writing to support men who were imprisoned for being gay in Tunisia, Costas who was attacked in Greece and Ihar Tsikhanyuk, a drag artist and LGBTI activist from Belarus, who was beaten by police for being gay. In addition, we will also discuss arrangements for a stall in April. All welcome, no special skills needed. To find us in the cafe, look out for a table with an Amnesty sign on it (either on the ground floor or upstairs area of the café). E-mail: amnestycambridgecity@gmail.com

 

CB2 Cafe, Norfolk St
